items.text: The reason this works at all, comes down to the difference between FragmentPagerAdapter and FragmentStatePagerAdapter.
items.href: Looping/infinite ViewPager with page indicator in Android | by Ali Muzaffar | Medium

items.text: This version of the pager is more useful when there are a large number of pages, working more like a list view.
items.href: Looping/infinite ViewPager with page indicator in Android | by Ali Muzaffar | Medium
